Congratulations on Xingliang Du's ISSRE'22 paper "AexPy: Detecting API Breaking Changesin Python Packages". Bio I obtained my Ph.D. degree in computer science and technology from Nanjing University (NJU) in 2015 (Ph.D. advisor: Prof. Xianping TAO), and Bachelor degree in computer science and technology from Nanjing University in 2003. The coach of NJU ICPC-Training Team since 2007. I am now an associate professor with Nanjing University.
